product_name: Pearl Izumi Attack Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: A perennial favorite of the weekend warrior, the men's Pearl Izumi Attack bike shorts provide function and durability with features usually only found in high-end shorts. SELECT Transfer fabric provides cool comfort, quickly wicking moisture and offering excellent stretch for freedom of movement. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Anatomic 8-panel design eliminates any uncomfortable inseams, as well as potential pressure points. Seamless 3D Race chamois has 13mm contoured padding to prevent friction points and provide protection in key areas. Chamois relieves pressure points with differentiated padding levels and wicks moisture away from skin. Flatlock seams decrease the likelihood of uncomfortable chafing. Silicone grippers at leg hems hold the Pearl Izumi Attack bike shorts in position. Reflective elements boost your visibility in low light.
